plot: A gentleman on a beach-chair is surprised by the high tide, and takes his trousers off to keep them dry. A policeman chases him across the beach and through the village of Zandvoort, until he is arrested.
title: De mésaventure van een Fransch heertje zonder pantalon aan het strand te Zandvoort
plot_es: A gentleman on a beach-chair is surprised by the high tide, and takes his trousers off to keep them dry. A policeman chases him across the beach and through the village of Zandvoort, until he is arrested.
original_name: De mésaventure van een Fransch heertje zonder pantalon aan het strand te Zandvoort
plot_en: A gentleman on a beach-chair is surprised by the high tide, and takes his trousers off to keep them dry. A policeman chases him across the beach and through the village of Zandvoort, until he is arrested.
